mapper.select: SELECT USERNAME, ACCOUNT_STATUS, DEFAULT_TABLESPACE FROM DBA_USERS, USER_SCH_TB where DBA_USERS.USERNAME = upper(USER_SCH_TB.USER_SCH_NM) and USER_SCH_TB.USER_ID = #{user} order by USERNAME

SELECT u.user_id "id" , d.username "user" , d.account_status "accountStatus" , d.default_tablespace "defaultTableSpace" FROM dba_users d, user_sch_tb u where d.username = u.user_sch_nm AND u.user_id = #{userId}
